name: CMIOExtensionProvider
desc: An object that manages device connections for a provider.

items.name: init(source: CMIOExtensionProviderSource, clientQueue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Creates an extension provider with the specified source and dispatch queue.

items.name: var clientQueue: DispatchQueue
items.desc: The dispatch queue on which the system performs client operations.

items.name: func addDevice(CMIOExtensionDevice)
items.desc: Adds a device to a provider.

items.name: func removeDevice(CMIOExtensionDevice)
items.desc: Removes a device from a provider.

items.name: func notifyPropertiesChanged([CMIOExtensionProperty : CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>])
items.desc: Notifies connected clients of device property changes.
